author: DamiLee
description:
The DMZ is one of the most heavily protected borders on Earth, yet it’s become an accidental sanctuary where wildlife has flourished for decades. I reflect on visiting this no-man’s land, how nature evolved around danger, and how my old architecture project imagined a wildlife corridor reconnecting the two Koreas. More stories on this coming soon !

What part of the DMZ’s story surprised you the most?
title: Sanctuary at the DMZ?
